title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description:
Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)

Steps to reproduce: 
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select project P2.
3. Attempt to close P2.

Observed behavior: 
Notice that the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' menu item is not.

Expected behavior: 
Both the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items should be available regardless of the selected project.
OB: Notice that the 'Open Project' menu item is available, but the 'Close Project' menu item is not.
EB: Both the 'Open Project' and 'Close Project' menu items should be available regardless of the selected project.
SR: Create two projects, P1 and P2. Select P2 and attempt to close it.
